We included only those members of the sample who were male, 21 years of age or older at enrollment, and who reported enrollment and termination dates between January 1 and December 31, 1976.
Further detailed on the construction of the comparison sample are pre- sented in Dickinson, Johnson and West (1984, pp. 37-45).
